run_macro(macroname, log_folder='logs')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class MacroWriter[source]

MacroWriter(macro_folder='mac', results_folder='results', logs_folder='logs', system_thickness=1, system_y_loc=0, sensor_material='Silicon', physics_list='QGSP_BERT_EMV')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
n_phantom_layers = 10
phantom_thickness = 1
phantom_material = 'Water'
distance_to_system = 1

my_macro = MacroWriter()

for layer in range(n_phantom_layers):
    # set material to Skull for the first and the last layer
    if layer == 0 or layer == n_phantom_layers - 1:
        phantom_material = 'Skull'
    y_loc = phantom_thickness*layer
    my_macro.create_phantom_layer(n=layer, thickness=phantom_thickness, y_loc=y_loc,
                                 material=phantom_material)
    
sensor_loc = phantom_thickness * n_phantom_layers + distance_to_system
my_macro.create_sensor(thickness=0.2, y_loc=sensor_loc)
main_macro, output_root = my_macro.create_macro_file()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
run_macro(main_macro)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
